import React,{useState} from "react"; import Base from '../core/Base'; import { Link,Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; import { Col, Button, Row, Container, Card, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import {signin,isAuthenticated,authenticate} from "../auth/helper" const Signin=()=> { const [values,setValues] = useState({ email:"", password:"", error:"", loading:"", didRedirect:false }); const {email,password,error,loading,didRedirect} = values; //getting user from jwt in signup const {user} =isAuthenticated(); const signInForm = () =>{ return(

SignIn

Email Password

If New User??{' '} Sign Up

) } return ( {signInForm()} ) } export default Signin;
